content:
Hey Friends, in this morning's IPA call, I mentioned the currently open (for another week) UK Base FHIR ballot. See: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=81008141 and https://simplifier.net/guide/hl7fhirukcorer4release1/home.

The aim of this ballot is for the UK FHIR community to provide feedback on this material.
